aboutMeSection.aboutMe_text_intro: I'm Arpita, a web developer on a mission to make the internet a bit more delightful—one line of code at a time! Armed with a keyboard, creativity, and a healthy appetite for pizza, I thrive in the world of pixels and programming while continuously learning and exploring. I believe that laughter can tackle any tricky bug, and I aim to create websites that leave users grinning.
aboutMeSection.aboutMe_text_connect: Let’s team up and craft something exceptional together, all while keeping the fun alive!

skillsSection.skills_text_shortDesc: I not only work with these technologies but excellent in using them with best practices to deliver high-quality results, I have been working with all these skills to build my portfolio projects

contactMeSection.contactMe_text_connect_shortDesc1: Feel free to reach out if you’d like to collaborate
contactMeSection.contactMe_text_connect_shortDesc2: you are just a few clicks away!

experienceSection.experience_text_shortDesc: With 4 years of experience building dynamic and user-friendly web applications.
experienceSection.experience_text_shortDesc_note: *In my current company (dealing with banking domain)

experienceDetails_text.technologies: React, Angular, Next JS and modern JavaScript
experienceDetails_text.description: leveraging best practices to create scalable and maintainable solutions.
experienceDetails_text.handsOnExperience: Additionally, I have hands-on experience with
experienceDetails_text.understanding: enabling me to understand and contribute to both frontend and backend systems effectively.
experienceDetails_text.overallExperience: My experience spans a variety of projects, from small business websites to complex
experienceDetails_text.codeQuality: where I consistently prioritize clean code and exceptional user experiences.
experienceDetails_text.integration: By bridging the gap between frontend and backend development, I ensure seamless functionality and integration across all layers of the application.
